gist.headline: Airforce grounded
gist.blurb: Temporarily pausing Airforce models to keep the error rates low. They'll be back when the weather clears.
gist.summary: Temporarily disabled api.airforce models (Wan, Imagen-4, Grok-Video) due to upstream provider instability.
gist.impact: Users will see fewer models available until the provider recovers.
gist.visual_concept: Bee mechanic. A pixel art plane or airforce motif being repaired. The bee looking at a 'Under Maintenance' sign.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art of the bee mascot wearing a tiny mechanic's cap, holding a wrench next to a sleeping pixel airplane. Lime green (#ecf874) accents. Soft pastel background. Chunky sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi aesthetic.
